title: Did a seven-year-old boy die because he didn't keep the Bible numbers?
subtitle: In April 2018 in Wisconsin, reports of a horrific death indicate that the victim was "punished" by his guardian.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: At the time of his death in April 2018, 7-year-old Ethan Haucholtz was punished for not keeping 13 Bible verses.
